staff-description: If youâ€™re looking for a personal trainer to get you going on your fitness plan, or already have been working on your exercise goals but need a personal trainer in Portland to kick start your routine to new levels, look no further. Hollywood Fitness offers the best Portland personal training around. Our personal trainers have years of experience helping the local people of Portland and we have the reviews to prove it. Scroll down the page to meet them!
